ProductInfo.Features:
4th Generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache); Genuine Windows® 8 64
2TB Dual Hard Drive Configuration: 1TB 5400RPM Hard Drive + 1TB 5400RPM Secondary Hard Drive both include HP ProtectSmart Protection; 16GB DDR3 1600MHz RAM (2 Dimm)
17.3-inch diagonal Full HD Anti-glare LED-backlit Display (1920 x 1080), Blu-ray Writer and SuperMulti DVD burner; 6 Cell Battery
NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M Graphics with 2048MB of dedicated video memory; Integrated Intel 802.11b/g/n (2x2); Bluetooth; Intel Smart Connect Technology plus WiDi support
Full Size Backlit Keyboard; Beats Audio with 4 Speakers; 4 SuperSpeed USB 3.0; 1 HDMI; 1 RJ45;Fingerprint Reader; 120W AC power adapter; 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY 17t-j000 Quad Edition Notebook PC (Silver); Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 17.3" Full HD Anti-Glare Display (1920 x 1080p), 2TB's via Dual Hard Drives (1TB 5400RPM + 1TB 5400RPM), 2GB NVIDIA GT 740M Dedicated Graphics, Blu-Ray Burner/Writer & 16GB DDR3L RAM (LATEST MODEL)
